trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 指定允许持久性的工作流进入空闲状态时发生的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>时计划程序没有其他挂起的工作项且工作流运行时可以保持调用函数。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>函数调用时不允许持久性，并且两个<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>和<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>允许持久性时按顺序调用。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>

trans-unit.source: None is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> handler is provided.
trans-unit.target: 无是默认操作，如果没有<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>提供处理程序。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no action is taken.
Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist the workflow.
Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist and unload the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref>应保持并卸载工作流。
